Package Utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Line3
    Line3 is a common implementation of a 3D infinite line.
    LinearScale3
    LinearScale3 is a common math object that easily computes linear scales in 3D.
    Plane
    Plane is a common implementation of a 3D infinite plane.
    Vector2
    Vector2 is a common implementation of 2D Vectors.
    Vector3
    Vector3 is a common implementation of 3D Vectors.
